Content:
# Quick Draw

![screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Jugale/quickdraw/master/AppStore/Screenshot%201.png)

Do you need a quick, easy and unobtrusive way to highlight content while screencasting?
Rather than circling your mouse around wildly, try QuickDraw!

When QuickDraw is active, you can draw lines, arrows, rectangle and circles over other windows on your screen. Press the escape key to clear the drawing, and press it again to jump right back to where you were without missing a beat!

### Usage
Keyboard Shortcuts
Translation:
# Dibujo Rápido

![captura de pantalla](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Jugale/quickdraw/master/AppStore/Screenshot%201.png)

¿Necesitas una forma rápida, fácil y discreta de resaltar contenido mientras haces screencasting?
En lugar de mover el ratón de forma descontrolada, ¡prueba Dibujo Rápido!

Cuando Dibujo Rápido está activo, puedes dibujar líneas, flechas, rectángulos y círculos sobre otras ventanas en tu pantalla. Pulsa la tecla escape para borrar el dibujo, y púlsala de nuevo para volver justo a donde estabas sin perder el ritmo.

### Uso
Atajos de teclado

RowTranslations.originContent: # Quick Draw
RowTranslations.translatedContent: # Dibujo Rápido

RowTranslations.originContent: ![screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Jugale/quickdraw/master/AppStore/Screenshot%201.png)
RowTranslations.translatedContent: ![captura de pantalla](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Jugale/quickdraw/master/AppStore/Screenshot%201.png)

RowTranslations.originContent: Do you need a quick, easy and unobtrusive way to highlight content while screencasting?
RowTranslations.translatedContent: ¿Necesitas una forma rápida, fácil y discreta de resaltar contenido mientras haces screencasting?

RowTranslations.originContent: Rather than circling your mouse around wildly, try QuickDraw!
RowTranslations.translatedContent: En lugar de mover el ratón de forma descontrolada, ¡prueba Dibujo Rápido!

RowTranslations.originContent: When QuickDraw is active, you can draw lines, arrows, rectangle and circles over other windows on your screen. Press the escape key to clear the drawing, and press it again to jump right back to where you were without missing a beat!
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Cuando Dibujo Rápido está activo, puedes dibujar líneas, flechas, rectángulos y círculos sobre otras ventanas en tu pantalla. Pulsa la tecla escape para borrar el dibujo, y púlsala de nuevo para volver justo a donde estabas sin perder el ritmo.

RowTranslations.originContent: ### Usage
RowTranslations.translatedContent: ### Uso

RowTranslations.originContent: Keyboard Shortcuts
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Atajos de teclado

Content:
```
Key/s       Function
~~~~~       ~~~~~~~~
12345       Select colours 1 to 5
L           Line mode - hold Shift while drawing for straight lines
A           Arrow mode - hold Shift while drawing for straight arrows
R           Rectangle mode - hold Shift while drawing to fill
C           Circle mode - hold Shift while drawing to fill
⌘C          Copy screenshot to Clipboard (permissions may be requested the first time)
⌘S          Save a screenshot to Finder
⌘Z          Undo
Space       Hold whilst drawing to adjust object position
⌫           Backspace to delete all drawings below the mouse
/           Show or hide the startup message (persisted)
⌥/          Show or hide the toolbar (persisted)
ESC         Clear all drawings. Press again to hide Quick Draw
```
Translation:
```
Key/s       Function
~~~~~       ~~~~~~~~
12345       Select colours 1 to 5
L           Line mode - hold Shift while drawing for straight lines
A           Arrow mode - hold Shift while drawing for straight arrows
R           Rectangle mode - hold Shift while drawing to fill
C           Circle mode - hold Shift while drawing to fill
⌘C          Copy screenshot to Clipboard (permissions may be requested the first time)
⌘S          Save a screenshot to Finder
⌘Z          Undo
Space       Hold whilst drawing to adjust object position
⌫           Backspace to delete all drawings below the mouse
/           Show or hide the startup message (persisted)
⌥/          Show or hide the toolbar (persisted)
ESC         Clear all drawings. Press again to hide Quick Draw
```

Content:
## Motivation
1. I  mentor an online Swift course and would like a quick, easy and unobtrusive way to highlight and describe code during video calls
2. I would like to increase my experience in macOS development (I am an iOS developer)
3. I would like to experiment with creating a simple architecture that has no third party dependencies

## Found a bug?
Feel free to create an issue, or fix it yourself - pull requests are welcome!
Translation:
## Motivación
1. Soy mentor de un curso en línea de Swift y me gustaría una forma rápida, fácil y discreta de resaltar y describir código durante las videollamadas
2. Me gustaría aumentar mi experiencia en desarrollo para macOS (soy desarrollador de iOS)
3. Me gustaría experimentar creando una arquitectura simple que no tenga dependencias de terceros

## ¿Encontraste un error?
No dudes en crear un issue, o corregirlo tú mismo: ¡las pull requests son bienvenidas!

RowTranslations.translatedContent: ## Motivación
